monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Aqua Blast
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Armor Crush
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Armor Break on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Breaking Spells
skills.description: Every magical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Breaking Support
skills.description: Every heal applied by this monster has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break on a random enemy. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Armor Break.

skills.name: Buff Catalyst
skills.description: Buffs are 20% more effective on this Monster.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Enlightened
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Force of Nature
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (750 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Full Defense
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield, Regeneration & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (200 + 30% Magic) Shield target for 4 x (200 + 30% Defense) Removes 6 Debuffs

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Mud Cannon
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Overheal
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster is getting healed above Max Health, convert 50% of that amount into a Shield.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Regeneration Shield
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) also shields the Monster by 7.5% of its Max Health at the start of turn.

skills.name: Remunerate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 60% chance to gain Regeneration (Buff).

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Support
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Support Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Support Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.

drops.name: Phoenix Tear
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 4 x 200
